name: Deal of the Day Bling Bling or Ice Cream Collection Buy 3 for Get 2 Free
description:
CUSTOMER APPRECIATION MONTH SPECIAL LIMITED SUPPLY ONLY , BUY NOW!!!!!

This deal of the day listing is for 3 3 1/2 inch Bling Bling Collection or Ice Cream Collection bamboo's, mix or match, for a discounted price of $59.99 plus receive 2 pair free. For a total of 6 pair.

Regular Price $49.95 each The iLL Line Promo Price $59.99 for 3 pair, and receive 2 pair free.

These are also available in 1 inch, 1 3/4 inch, 2 1/2 inch, 3 inch , 3 1/2 inch , and 4 inch sizes. 4 inch bamboo's may be slightly higher. 

This listing is for one 3 1/2 inch pair unless other size is requested. These bamboo earrings are gorgeous. Bling Bling!!! We use a new technique to produce the bling bling effect.These earrings absolutely rock!! Due to the overwhelming request for an earring with the bling effect, but, at a economical price. Our design team has produced an ingenious solution for customers who love to bling bling, but at a reasonable price. These earrings are on sale at 60% off for our new release promotional sale. 

The earrings are bedazzled on the front and back and are exclusive to The iLL Lines only. We have 15 colors, with 25 new colors coming soon. These earrings are also lightweight. 40% lighter than typical earrings that are similiar in size.

COLORS AVAILABLE - Black, Lt. Blue, Navy Blue, Gunmetal, Turquoise, Pink, Silver, Gold, Multi-Color, Red, Fuchsia, Green, Purple, Orange, Brown, Forest Green, Iridescent white (slightly higher) 

If you would like a free pair of these earrings or other earrings in our shop, 'Like' our fan page on on Facebook for free weekly giveaways and contest, special coupon codes and exclusive look at new releases. http://www.facebook.com/pages/The-iLL-Lines/271482012878736 also

WE SHIP WORLDWIDE AND WE OFFER WHOLESALE DISCOUNTS

name: 2 1/2" Swarovski Two-Color Blue Jean Bamboo Earrings
description:
These Genuine Swarovski Earrings are encrusted with aprx 800 individually set Swarovski Crystals. These are the perfect size, 2 1/2" round. Not to small, not to big. These crystals are absolutely gorgeous. The iridescent design, gives them a 3d look that sparkles and shines like you wouldnt believe. Pictures do these no justice. Guaranteed to catch all the attention where-ever these are worn. 

We also carry matching bamboo bangles, just in http://www.etsy.com/listing/82376707/new-matching-swarovski-crystal-bamboo

*These earrings are available in any color or combination of colors.

name: Swarovski Crystal Bamboo Hoop Earrings - Crystal Clear - Half Off Edition
description:
These earrings are seen on many tv shows. Basketball Wives, The Housewives of Atlanta, and Love and Hip Hop, among other. The Bamboo Earrings are made from Genuine Swarovski Crystals. The bamboo earrings are aprx. 3" all the way around with over aprx 400 individually hand set crystals. These Bamboo's are the height of extraordinary. This pair is apart of our economical collection. Only the front sides are bedazzled in Swarovski Crystals. So you only pay aprx. half the price of our Swarovski Crystal Bling Collection that has both sides bedazzled. Either way you can spot the bling bling from across the room. Swarovski crystals are the top of the line when it comes to shine and bling. 

These can be worn on special occasions, or on a everyday basis. They are very versatile. The pictures do these no justice whatsoever.The way these shine are just unbelieveable. Guaranteed to grab attention whereever/whenever these are worn. They are also on the best seller list.

We also carry sizes from 1 - 4 inches. Whatever fits you best. We can accommodate your needs.We also do custom orders. If you see a design you want to match that special outfit, or any combination of colors, dont hesitate to contact us, we can custom make your earrings to your preference.

We ship worldwide. If you are outside of the United States, please checkout and we will invoice you the difference in shipping prices. Thank You
